pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Forests.$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 0-2 $(item)Raw Porkchop$(), 0-2 $(item)Cooked Porkchop$() if killed with fire, 0-1 $(item)Leather$()

pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Beaver is a peaceful little creature that wanders the plains of the world. While the beaver itself does not chomp down trees as youâ€™d expect it to, It does wander the world. So if you want to take a Beaver for yourself to keep for fun, Then go for it.
